price: 15. ¿Acaso no ven que Al-lah creó siete cielos superpuestos
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: alam taraw kayfa khalaqa al-lahu sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan
